name: Space Rogue (itch) (IDF31)
description:
Gather points destroying enemy ships!

I made all the scripts.

Art from https://kenney.nl/assets/

Controls:

Arrow keys to move and space to shoot.

Update 2018/11/2:

  • Fixed collision bug with enemy ships
  • Minor bug fixes

Update 2018/12/2:

  • Fixed warp speed bug

Update 2018/13/2:

  • Added turning animation
  • You now loose points when you miss enemies
